workshop.description: Between runs, you can now visit the Workshop and spend Balance Points to add new items to your deck (until the adventurer retires).

hand_size_increase.title: Hand Size Increased
hand_size_increase.description: You can now hold more cards in your hand, giving you more options.

boss_fights.description: Powerful bosses will now appear at the end of certain floors. Defeat them for great rewards.
